summary: Evil spirits released from old celluloid cause a film crew to slowly go insane while in production on a new project.
cast: Rachael Murphy|Eli Roth|Ben DiGregorio|Reshad Strik|Alyssa Sutherland|Shiloh Fernandez|Henry Thomas|Lothaire Bluteau|Robert Towers|Carmen Chaplin|Daniela Sea|Jack Dimich|Elena Satine|Zelda Williams|Brian Henderson|Kevin Corrigan|Kyle Archer|Laura Lance|David Dayan Fisher|Gil Darnell|Ajla Hodzic|Candi Milo|Mark Mench|George Anton|Luca Bello|Scott Alan Berk|Bianca Bonciu|Ian Fisher|Alma S. Grey|Kelly Hitman|Lori Johnson|Eva Kapusi|Justin Loyal|Johnny Mask|Eric Stitt|Sebastian "Sebass" Wolski
title: Miedo oculto
